name: The Darkest Mines
description:
Submission for the MiniJam 32

Theme: Explosions
Time:  Created in 18 hours
Limitation: Destruction must be a core mechanic.

Controls: WASD = movement
Mouse Click= Interact/Pickup/Place bomb
ESC = Quit application 
R = Restart from Checkpoint

"Night Cave" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
